content: **join our happy cats mcal with this free heart coaster ** **our 2024 happy cats mcal** includes a quilt style afghan and matching pillow featuring 10 darling cats **crocheted with my specially developed method for single_crochet color-change the heart coaster in this intro download** is a great way to become familiar with my technique the intro also includes information about yarn amounts and colors needed for the mcal afghan and pillow **our cat adventure has begun with our cute pillow 1 ** **then we start the first of our afghan cat squares on february 13 2024 ** **a new square** will be revealed **every third tuesday** through july 30 2024 **by the end of our mcal you will have your very own happy cats afghan and matching pillow ** **be sure to post a photo of your finished heart coaster** to your ravelry project page or to our group topic to receive your free coupon code for the cat pillow * coupon sent to your ravelry inbox when pillow is available * suitable for advanced beginners i provide support for your questions and help through our ravelry group both line-by-line instructions and chart are included for each square > join in our craft designs for you > ravelry group > www ravelry com/groups/craft-designs-for-you > to get future cal patterns for free > and let s crochet-along together 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/happy-cats-pillow
